alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:41AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick, southeastern Harvey and western Butler Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 340 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valley Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Andover, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Maize, Sedgwick, Towanda, Colwich, Benton, Whitewater, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, Bentley, Potwin, West Wichita, East Wichita and Northeast Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 6 and 23. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 47 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
